alert.note: Alert for Northampton (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 4:19PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A line of showers with gusty winds will impact portions of Morris, northeastern Hunterdon, Sussex, Warren, northwestern Somerset and northeastern Northampton Counties through 500 PM EST... At 418 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers with strong gusty winds along a cold front extending from near Milford to near Blairstown to Old Orchard. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Easton, Newton, Montague, Bridgewater, Dover, Hopatcong, Hackettstown, Wharton, Washington, Rockaway, Blairstown, Morris Plains, Mount Arlington, Franklin, Mendham, Mountain Lakes, High Bridge, Stanhope, Hamburg and Netcong. This includes the following highways... Interstate 78 in New Jersey between mile markers 8 and 32. Interstate 80 in New Jersey between mile markers 2 and 41. Interstate 287 in New Jersey between mile markers 20 and 25. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
